title: Raymate Bluetooth Speakers, Pair up to 100 Speakers,IPX7 Waterproof Speaker Wireless Bluetooth-V5.3, HiFi Stereo Sound, 1100mins Playtime, Portable Speaker for Home, Outdoor, Party
descriptions:
Raymate Bluetooth Speakers — clear sound made simple.

- Easy to use
  - Big Turntable button on top. Turn to change volume. Press to play or pause. No tiny buttons to hunt for.
  - Pairs quickly with your phone, tablet, or TV using Bluetooth 5.3. Once you set it up the first time, it reconnects automatically.

- Loud, clear sound
  - HiFi stereo with dual speakers and a strong amplifier, so voices, music, and radio are crisp.
  - Balanced sound without harshness or buzzing, even at higher volume.

- Long battery life
  - Up to 18 hours of play time (about 1,100 minutes) from the 3600 mAh battery. Great for a full day or evening.
  - Easy charging with the included USB-C (Type‑C) cable.

- Built for everyday life
  - Waterproof IPX7: safe around the kitchen, bathroom, patio, or by the pool. Resists rain, splashes, dust, and even snow.
  - Portable, light, and sturdy. The smooth cylindrical shape is easy to pick up and carry from room to room.

- Use it anywhere
  - Perfect for home listening, porch or garden time, and family gatherings or parties.
  - Want bigger sound? You can link multiple Raymate speakers—up to 100—for whole‑house or backyard coverage.

What you do
1) Charge it with the USB‑C cable until the light shows full.
2) Turn it on. Open Bluetooth on your phone and choose “Raymate.”
3) Turn the top dial to set volume. Press to play or pause. Enjoy.

Raymate Bluetooth Speakers: friendly controls, strong battery, and clear, warm sound—so you can simply press, play, and relax.
